about_the_game:
Memory updated

Here’s an updated Overview with the environment and music selections included:

Retro Wave is a relaxing VR rhythm experience that transports players into vibrant, retro-futuristic landscapes, syncing with nostalgic synthwave beats. This game offers an immersive journey through neon-lit environments, with various settings and music selections designed to provide a calming yet captivating experience.

Explore a range of stunning environments, from neon cityscapes to cosmic dreamscapes, while enjoying a variety of carefully curated synthwave tracks. Retro Wave allows you to immerse yourself in a soothing flow of audio-visual harmony, making it the perfect way to unwind in VR.

Key Features:

  • Immersive VR Experience: Feel fully surrounded by stunning environments and captivating music.

  • Relaxing Gameplay: No pressure, no stress—just enjoy the rhythmic flow.

  • Various Environments: Explore a variety of beautifully designed retro-futuristic worlds.

  • Music Selection: Choose from a range of nostalgic synthwave tracks that perfectly match each environment.

  • Retro-Futuristic Visuals: Inspired by 80s synthwave aesthetics, enjoy vibrant colors and futuristic designs.

  • Calming and Meditative: Perfect for players looking for a serene and mesmerizing VR experience.

name: Retro Wave

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • VR Support: Quest , Oculus Rift, HTC Vive, or Windows Mixed Reality headsets
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i7-6700 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600 or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • VR Support: Oculus Quest 2 or higher (via Oculus Link), Oculus Rift, HTC Vive, or Windows Mixed Reality

short_description: A soothing VR rhythm experience where players drift through vibrant, retro-futuristic landscapes, immersed in mesmerizing synthwave beats. Relax and lose yourself in neon-lit visuals that captivate the senses, offering an immersive journey designed to calm and inspire.
